description: Adaptive Layout parameters for ObjectForm filter options.

recurse.description: Recurse filter options to embedded objects.
recurse.label: Recurse

filterCondAndProperties.description: Specifies exclusive (AND) conditions for properties to display (required, optional, valued, unvalued).
filterCondAndProperties.label: Exclusive Property Conditions

filterCondOrProperties.description: Specifies inclusive (OR) conditions for properties to display (required, optional, valued, unvalued).
filterCondOrProperties.label: Inclusive Property Conditions

filterExcludeProperties.description: Do not display the specified properties.
filterExcludeProperties.label: Hide Properties

filterRequiredProperties.description: Show properties only if they are required.
filterRequiredProperties.label: Show Required Properties

filterValuedProperties.description: Show properties only if they contain values.
filterValuedProperties.label: Show Valued Properties
